page.title: 06EDUCATION
page.content: LETHAM SCHOOL was built in 1913 and has 143 pupils.Some of these come from Letham and a few from surrounding villages and farms.The pupils get physical education,art and music from teachers who visit the school.There are seven classes,6 teachers and 1 head mistress.School begins at 9am and after a fifteen minute break at 10.45 it continues until 12.25pm- lunchtime. About 50% of the pupils stay at school for lunch, either School Dinners or Packed Lunches The afternoon begins at 1.40 .Primaries 1 and 2 get out at 3.05 pm while the rest of the school get out at 3.30pm. After Letham School pupils attend Forfar Academy, travelling by bus.Pupils' behaviour on the bus is criticised by the bus drivers.
